code: @Override public void open(Configuration configuration) {     super.open(configuration).     try {         this.mappingManager = new MappingManager(session).         this.mapper = mappingManager.mapper(clazz).         if (options != null) {             Mapper.Option[] optionsArray = options.getMapperOptions().             if (optionsArray != null) {                 this.mapper.setDefaultSaveOptions(optionsArray).             }         }     } catch (Exception e) {         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot create CassandraPojoSink with input: " + clazz.getSimpleName(), e).     } }
